ComicInfo.Title: Volume 1
ComicInfo.Summary: Contains Weeks 1 - 4 plus bonus material! The creative team behind IRREDEEMABLE brings you a new tale of dark peril, high adventure, and a superhero family torn apart! Once, Nocturnus and Galahad were St. Barrington's premier super-team--but after an acrimonious split, one has become an elusive spirit, the other an egotistical blowhard--and the only thing they both hate more than crime is each another! What act by which terrible villain could possibly reunite them...? Join Eisner-award winning writer Mark Waid (Daredevil, Kingdom Come) and artist Peter Krause to find out!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 16:22:02. [CVDB373869]
